definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: I think it, you are such scum should die.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得吧，你這樣的敗類應該去死。

sentences.english: Those degenerates who tried in vain to split their own county will not escape from historical punishments.
sentences.chinese: 圖謀分裂國家的民族敗類，最終逃脫不了歷史的懲罰。

sentences.english: No. You know. Still the resident family fuckup.
sentences.chinese: 不，你知道的，依然是家裏的敗類。

sentences.english: How I bore a degenerate like you.
sentences.chinese: 黃母我怎麼生了你這麼一個敗類。

definition: in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side/to have the courage of one's convictions/just and forceful
to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable/item sold at a loss
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
